H0.text: Which animal has breeds called Flemish Giant, French Lop and Netherland Dwarf. Guinea Pig

H1.text: Which animal has breeds called Flemish Giant, French Lop and Netherland Dwarf. Hamster

H2.text: Which animal has breeds called Flemish Giant, French Lop and Netherland Dwarf. Cat

H3.text: Which animal has breeds called Flemish Giant, French Lop and Netherland Dwarf. RABBIT

A4.text: The breed known as the Belgian hare is actually a domestic rabbit which has been selectively bred to resemble a hare, most likely from Flemish Giant stock originally.

A5.text: Rabbits, specifically the European rabbit (Oryctolagus cuniculus) species, have long been domesticated.
